description:
FULLY FURNISHED incl. Queen, sofa bed, coffee table, mirror. Newly renovated studio apartment with Juliet balcony. Gourmet kitchen equipped with custom cabinetry, granite counter-tops and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave. Bright, quiet, hardwood floors and high ceilings. 

Dishwasher
High Ceilings
Microwave
Stainless steel appliances
Balconies and Terraces
CitiBike convenient to building
Dishwashers
Elevators
Laundry Room
Video Security System

The place is fully furnished including Coffee Table, Sofa Bed, Queen size bed, stand up mirror etc. Contact me for virtual video.
name: Studio apt with Queen + Sofa bed/great location
review: Kevin was great and extremely friendly!  This was my first time trying Airbnb and I had an excellent experience! Definitely will return to the city and stay at Kevin's home again!
